data: Based on the question, "During the past 12 months, has a doctor or other health professional talked with you about changes to your developing body, or safe sex practices?" Respondents who did not see a health professional in the past 12 months were included in the denominator and categorized as not having discussed puberty and sexual health with a healthcare professional.
